roleset.name: molecular event of producing genetic product called protein

example.text: A transcript can be efficiently translated into a C-terminal truncated protein containing the first, second and third transmembrane domains, while the splicing out of exons 3 and 4 would produce a protein with five membrane-spanning domains but lacking the third and fourth domains present in the ET-AR protein.
example.arg: a C-terminal truncated protein containing the first, second and third transmembrane domains
